summary: Implements an asynchronous service that connects via websocket to a remote queue of scheduled task runs, subscribes to new runs, and forwards each run to the engine with a minimal execution context using a configurable task runner, while handling lifecycle events and termination signals.
business_intent: Automate the delivery and execution of scheduled tasks so that they can be processed autonomously by the engine under orchestration rules, decoupling scheduling from execution and ensuring reliable task serving.
